title: panca bANuDu (j)
sahitya:
(rAgA:  tODi)   
  panca-bANuDu nApai veDalinADu inka koncamaina sairincuTa vashamA
nannu tODikoni sarasamADuTaku kannaDa sEyuTa nIku tagunA


anupallavi

  tummedalu mrOyega kOkilalu ammarO kUyaga cilukalu kalakalamani palukaga centa jEri nanu
celimi jEsi gAravinci kaugalinci movinicci vetala dIrca ra sarigAdu maunamu sArasAkSa
	(chittaswara � not available but followed by sarigAdu �)
			(rAg  AbhOgi)


caraNam 1    madana-bAdhala dIrci rA rA kamala vadana sundarAbhOga-sadana
madhuramaina nI palukalu amrtamu sudatI-maNikicci dayayencarA 
	(ciTTasvara not available but followed by sarigAdu �)
    caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  shankarAbharaNa)Aa:S R2 G3 M1 P D2 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  ani shankarAbharaNamutO velagE ghanamaina nI kara-parighamulO
(cheyi) paTTI nanu viDuvarAdani vEdina vaTTI panthamu jEsevEla rA
	(ciTTasvara not available but followed by sarigAdu �)
 caraNam 3  			(rAgA:  kAmbhOji)Aa:S R2 G3 M1 P D2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S N3 P D2 S  sarasijAstruni bAdha ika tALa jAla rA rA kRSNA bhUpAla
virahadAyakAmbhoja-vairini parihAsamu cala naravara tamasamEla
	(ciTTasvara not available but followed by sarigAdu �) 
 caraNam 4  			(rAgA:  shahAnA)Aa:S R2 G3 M1 P M1 D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 S D2 N2 D2 P M1 G3 M1 R2 G3 R2 S  shAna vaiyyAramu jEsina ati maunamutO shrI sadAshivuni
dhyAnamulO-nuNDE ninu kadalincuTa kAmunikU inka sAdhyamA 
(ciTTvra in shahAnA and other rAgas in reverse order, followed by sarigAdu �)
